title: What Governors Are Talking About In Their State Of The State Speeches
teaser: We take a look at what the governors of Colorado, Michigan and New York are planning for the year to come.
contentencoded:
President Obama addressed the nation this week in his sixth State of the Union speech laying out the groundwork of his administration for the year to come. Across the nation, governors have been doing the same at their statehouses.

Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson checks in on three states to see what’s in the governors’ plans for the year to come. Meghan Verlee of Colorado Public Radio, David Sommerstein of North Country Public Radio in New York and Rick Pluta of Michigan Radio join him.

Guests

  • Megan Verlee, reporter for Colorado Public Radio. She tweets @CPRverlee.
  • David Sommerstein, reporter for North Country Public Radio in New York. He tweets @davidncpr.
  • Rick Pluta, reporter covering government and politics for Michigan Radio. He tweets @rickpluta.
